Returns: True if this Row can be rendered in a visible row view, false otherwise.
isRenderedAsRowView().Description: Returns true if this Row can be rendered in a visible row view, false otherwise. For example @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRow_E@ is rendered by @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRowPresenter_E@. @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#PageRow_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#SectionRow_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#DividerRow_E@ are rendered as invisible row views.

Returns: The HeaderItem for this row, or null if unset.
getHeaderItem().Description: Returns the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#HeaderItem_E@ that represents metadata for the row.

Parameters: long: The id of the row.
setId(long).Description: Sets the id for this row.

getId().Description: Returns a unique identifier for this row. This id can come from one of three places: If @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Row#setId_E@ is ever called on this row, it will return this id. If @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#Row#setId_E@ has not been called but the header item is not null, the result of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#HeaderItem#getId_E@ is returned. Otherwise @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ObjectAdapter#NO_ID_E@ is returned.

ClassDesc: The base class for all rows. A commonly used subclass is the @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#ListRow_E@. Custom subclasses may define other types of rows.
